content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Boiler (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Offshore pump (position 2.0, 0.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 2.0, 0.0) and a furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position 2.0, 2.0) and a furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### Copper cable factory at position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position 0.0, 0.0) and inserter (position 0.0, 0.0) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position 0.0, 0.0) that connects the furnace at position 0.0, 0.0 to the assembling machine at position 0.0, 0.0

### Lab at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 5.5, 0.5)

### Small electric poles
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 6.5, 0.5)
- Small electric pole (position 16.5, 10.5)
- Small electric pole (position 20.5, 10.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to power sources
- Ensure that there are sufficient power sources (like solar panels or steam engines) nearby before attempting to connect electric poles or other power-dependent entities.

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Verify that the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. If the inventory is full, the insertion will fail.

### Errors when placing entities without sufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required entities in your inventory before attempting to place them. If you run out of an entity type, you will not be able to place it.
